[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@zextras/carbonio-ui-preview](./carbonio-ui-preview.md) &gt; [PreviewNavigatorProps](./carbonio-ui-preview.previewnavigatorprops.md) &gt; [closeAction](./carbonio-ui-preview.previewnavigatorprops.closeaction.md)

## PreviewNavigatorProps.closeAction property

Close action for the preview. The close action does not accept the onClick field, because its click callback is always set to be the onClose function.

**Signature:**

```typescript
closeAction?: Omit<HeaderAction, 'onClick'>;
```
